name: amedia-pwa-poc
description: An Amedia Proof of Concept for a PWA push app.

scripts.sw:hash:internal: echo "export const swHash = '${swHash%% *}';" > public/src/js/swHash.js && npm run build
scripts.sw:hash:update: npm run sw:hash:placeholder && swHash="$(sha256sum public/sw.js)" npm run sw:hash:internal
scripts.deploy:avisao: npm run sw:hash:update && webpack && firebase login && (firebase use app-nyheter-ao || (firebase login --reauth && firebase use app-nyheter-ao)) && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:polpos: npm run sw:hash:update && webpack && firebase login && (firebase use app-nyheter-polkaposten || (firebase login --reauth && firebase use app-nyheter-polkaposten)) && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:salsap: npm run sw:hash:update && webpack && firebase login && (firebase use app-nyheter-salsaposten || (firebase login --reauth && firebase use app-nyheter-salsaposten)) && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:fridansf: npm run sw:hash:update && webpack && firebase login && (firebase use fridans-faget || (firebase login --reauth && firebase use fridans-faget)) && firebase deploy
